divs: Sighting DetailsMy Uncle and wiFe were watching tv when ONe of our freinds tells us he saw a ufo. we all step outsIde to See it. My heart was beating as I watched the disc flying everywere like crazy. But i reported it so maybe someone can understand what it ment.
